channel.title: Frame/Mindwarp Ideas
channel.description:
I feel like no one thinks about frame when their investigating at all so my idea is that claiming to being framed should be a good idea soo
It should tell the player similar message to the player is redirection/occupation immune message when it says "or barriered by CW"
Examples:
13 is Unseen/Cult OR framed/mind warped 13 is Offensive/Killer OR framed/mind warped
Also I think that adding more classes that frame people would be very nice

item.title: Frame/Mindwarp Ideas
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Guess I’m really unlucky then

Well thanks for the feedback

item.title: Frame/Mindwarp Ideas
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Not really…

If you get framed as BD it’s gg no way of convincing BD you’re inno

Really lol… I’m pretty sure no one has ever called out on framing before in my 56 (*53) hours of game play

Read full topic

item.title: Frame/Mindwarp Ideas

item.description:
Completely defeats the purpose of framing to begin with. Framing is already called out 80% of the time in my experience.
